name: Novihum Technologies GmbH
goal: Novihum Technologies is bringing a new soil technology to European and global markets, a stable humus concentrate that makes soils more productive immediately and for the long term.  With the Novihum technology, we seek to help farmers safeguard and improve the health of their soils, to support more profitable and efficient production of high-quality food around the world.  We also seek to leverage Novihum to help combat the global challenges of food security, desertification, and deforestation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: We seek to raise awareness of the new Novihum technology, such that it and other soil technologies may be deployed where appropriate in Europe and around the world (e.g. in developing and emerging economies that receive European aid) to help solve key agricultural challenges.
